title: T3 Chief Wilson PSA 5 Well Below VCP

posts.post_title: T3 Chief Wilson PSA 5 Well Below VCP
posts.post_content: I am selling my #126 Chief Wilson PSA for $2500 Paypal Gift of $2575 standard Paypal.  This card has only sold 2 times and it sold for $4627 and $2872.  It is the final card in the T3 set and is very condition sensitive.  E-mail me at [url]incugator@hotmail.com[/url] for scan and details.
